name: Dictionaire Universel De Meca-Zoologie
description:
Dictionnaire Universel De Meca-Zoologie

Rare images retrieved from the last known copy of the fabled Mechanica Zoologica, written by the French explorer, zen master and food critic extraordinaire, Charles McGregor.

Made for Tillman & Gayle.

'SPACE' or Click to turn page.
On executable version (downloadable) : 'F' for full-screen, 'ESC' to exit
